title: Batman Arkham Origins ALL DLC PACK v5 + Bruce Wayne DLC
description:
KNIGHTFALL BUNDLE PACK
- 5 exclusive challenge maps: Azrael Does Not Protect, City On Fire, Venom Connection, Turning Point, No Rest For The Wicked
- 2 skins: KnightFall Batman, Classic TV Series Batman

DEATHSTROKE CHALLENGE PACK
- Take control of Deathstroke - the world's deadliest assassin and guide him through Arkham Origin's challenge maps.
- Two brand new Challenge maps: No Money Down and 100-to-1. Take on enemies armed with unique gadgets and special moves.
- Access to Special Challenge Campaign.
- 2 bonus skins: Judas Contract Deathstroke, Injustice Deathstroke, plus Classic Deathstroke Skin.

BLACK MASK PACK
- Awarded two more challenges: Lot Full, Hidden Facility

INITIATION PACK
- Travel back to the days before there was a Batman and take control of a young Bruce Wayne as he completes his martial arts training.
- Experience exotic locales including a bamboo forest and mountain-top monastery.
- New challenge campaign "RITE TO PASSAGE" with 5 new challenge maps: TOGAKURE-RYU, SHINOBI-IRI, TAIJUTSU, BORYAKU, SEISHINTEKI KYOYO.
- 2 new skins: Bruce Wayne Skin and Vigilante Skin.

NEW MILLENIUM SKINS PACK
- Skins Unlocked: 1st Appearance Batman, Batman: Noel, New 52 Graphic Batman, Red Son Batman, Blackest Night Batman
- One Year Later Robin Batman (online only)

INFINITE EARTHS SKINS PACK
- Skins Unlocked: Earth 2 Batman, Earth 2 Dark Knight, Dark Knight Of The Round Table, ThrillKiller Batman, Long Halloween Batman
- Classic Tim Drake Robin Batman (online only)

LEGENDS BATMAN SKINS PACK
- Skins already included in other two big packs. This is just for reference. (We dont need this pack anymore)
- 4 awesome Batman skins: Earth 2 Batman, ThrillKiller Batman, Long Halloween Batman, Dark Knight Of The Round Table.

EXCLUSIVE SKINS PACK
- 2 exclusive skins: Brightest Day Batman, Gotham By GasLight Batman
- 4 additional skins: Injustice Batman, Batman The Dark Knight, Batman One Million, New 52 Metallic Batman

ONLINE SUPPLY DROP 1 & 2 PACK
- These packs will give you an advantage in Online no matter what team you're on.
- Get 2 additional clothing items for Bane and Joker Characters with gameplay enhancing features.
- All-new weapon: Sawn-Off Shotgun complete with additional weapon progression and skins.

Note: All Skins are available from start for use in the challenge maps (except Robin costumes online only).
